content.text: Match ends, Everton 4, West Ham United 0.
Second Half ends, Everton 4, West Ham United 0.
Substitution, Everton. Nikola Vlasic replaces Dominic Calvert-Lewin.
Tom Davies (Everton) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Arthur Masuaku (West Ham United).
Foul by Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton).
Cheikhou Kouyaté (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Everton. Ademola Lookman replaces Aaron Lennon.
Attempt missed. Declan Rice (West Ham United) header from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Manuel Lanzini with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  West Ham United. Conceded by Cuco Martina.
Foul by Cuco Martina (Everton).
Michail Antonio (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Idrissa Gueye.
Substitution, Everton. Beni Baningime replaces Wayne Rooney.
Cheikhou Kouyaté (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton).
Offside, Everton. Ashley Williams tries a through ball, but Dominic Calvert-Lewin is caught offside.
Michail Antonio (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Cuco Martina (Everton).
Goal!  Everton 4, West Ham United 0. Ashley Williams (Everton) header from the centre of the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Gylfi Sigurdsson with a cross following a corner.
Substitution, West Ham United. Declan Rice replaces Winston Reid because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Winston Reid (West Ham United) because of an injury.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Winston Reid.
Attempt blocked. Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jonjoe Kenny.
Attempt missed. Diafra Sakho (West Ham United) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Manuel Lanzini following a set piece situation.
Manuel Lanzini (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Wayne Rooney (Everton).
Goal!  Everton 3, West Ham United 0. Wayne Rooney (Everton) right footed shot from more than 35 yards to the centre of the goal.
Diafra Sakho (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Ashley Williams (Everton).
Substitution, West Ham United. Michail Antonio replaces Marko Arnautovic.
Foul by Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton).
Angelo Ogbonna (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Penalty saved! Manuel Lanzini (West Ham United) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom left corner.
Penalty conceded by Ashley Williams (Everton) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty West Ham United. Diafra Sakho draws a foul in the penalty area.
Attempt blocked. Cheikhou Kouyaté (West Ham United) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Manuel Lanzini.
Attempt saved. Marko Arnautovic (West Ham United) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Tom Davies (Everton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Aaron Cresswell (West Ham United) hits the bar with a left footed shot from the left side of the box. Assisted by Manuel Lanzini.
Attempt saved. Manuel Lanzini (West Ham United) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Cheikhou Kouyaté.
Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Angelo Ogbonna (West Ham United).
Corner,  West Ham United. Conceded by Ashley Williams.
Substitution, West Ham United. Diafra Sakho replaces Pedro Obiang.
Second Half begins Everton 2, West Ham United 0.
First Half ends, Everton 2, West Ham United 0.
Corner,  West Ham United. Conceded by Jonjoe Kenny.
Foul by Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton).
Manuel Lanzini (West Ham United) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Aaron Lennon (Everton).
Manuel Lanzini (West Ham United) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Offside, West Ham United. Aaron Cresswell tries a through ball, but André Ayew is caught offside.
Angelo Ogbonna (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Tom Davies (Everton).
Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Marko Arnautovic (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton).
Tom Davies (Everton) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Pedro Obiang (West Ham United).
Goal!  Everton 2, West Ham United 0. Wayne Rooney (Everton) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jonjoe Kenny.
Attempt missed. Jonjoe Kenny (Everton) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Tom Davies.
Arthur Masuaku (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Aaron Lennon (Everton).
Pablo Zabaleta (West Ham United) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Pablo Zabaleta (West Ham United).
Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Corner,  West Ham United. Conceded by Tom Davies.
Corner,  West Ham United. Conceded by Jonjoe Kenny.
Goal!  Everton 1, West Ham United 0. Wayne Rooney (Everton) header from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal following a set piece situation.
Penalty saved! Wayne Rooney (Everton) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom left corner.
Penalty conceded by Joe Hart (West Ham United) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Everton. Dominic Calvert-Lewin draws a foul in the penalty area.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Pedro Obiang.
Pedro Obiang (West Ham United) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Tom Davies (Everton).
Tom Davies (Everton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Pedro Obiang (West Ham United).
Offside, Everton. Wayne Rooney tries a through ball, but Dominic Calvert-Lewin is caught offside.
Aaron Cresswell (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Aaron Lennon (Everton).
Corner,  West Ham United. Conceded by Idrissa Gueye.
Winston Reid (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton).
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
